purpose: The email invites proposals for satellite events to complement the main conferences of ETAPS 2026.
evidence_sentences: The ETAPS 2026 organizing committee invites proposals for satellite events (e.g., workshops) to complement the main conferences.
Satellite events provide an opportunity to discuss and report on emerging research approaches and practical experiences relevant to the theory and practice of software.
Deadline for proposals of satellite events: June 26, 2025.
Proposals will be evaluated by the ETAPS 2026 organizing committee based on their assessed benefit for prospective participants of ETAPS 2026.
